description:
DiHydrogen is the second version of the Hydrogen fork of the well-known distributed linear algebra library, Elemental. 

DiHydrogen is a GPU-accelerated distributed multilinear algebra interface with a particular emphasis on the needs of the scalable distributed deep learning training and inference.  

DiHydrogen is part of the Livermore Big Artificial Neural Network (LBANN) software stack.
name: DiHydrogen
